title: Development) Act 2021 (No. 40 of 2021), hereby order as follows:
heading: 2. The 17th day of December 2021 is appointed to be the day on which the
text_raw:
2. The 17th day of December 2021 is appointed to be the day on which the 
Planning 
(Large-scale Residential 
(Amendment) 
Development) Act 2021 (No. 40 of 2021), other than section 17(6), shall come 
into operation. 

and Development 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

16 December, 2021. 

DARRAGH O’BRIEN, 

Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 28th December, 2021.
